EmailTemplate.description: Email templete to notify end user about his user Status
EmailTemplate.name: IAM_User_Deactivate
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Account Deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your Cummins Online Account for {!Contact.Username__c} has been deactivated with the reason {!Contact.IAM_Reject_Reason__c} - "{!Contact.IAM_Reason__c}" To regain access please contact your location admin or Cummins Account Representative. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
